entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 1.
